mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (inquiry_code, user_code, inquiry_title, inquiry_content) values ('IQ' || lpad(INQUIRY_SEQ.nextval, 4, 0), #{userCode}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_respond = #{respond}, inquiry_respond_date = sysdate, inquiry_status = 'Y' where inquiry_code = #{inquiryCode}
mapper.select: select * from inquiry where user_code = #{value} order by inquiry_code desc
select * from (select * from inquiry where user_code = #{value} order by inquiry_created_date desc) where rownum <= 3

select inquiry.inquiry_code as code, inquiry.inquiry_title as title, inquiry.inquiry_content as content, inquiry.inquiry_created_date as createdDate, users.user_code as userCode, users.user_name as userName, users.user_team as userTeam, users.user_position as userPosition from inquiry, users where inquiry_status = 'N' and inquiry.user_code = users.user_code
